title: Validate email size greater than 64 MB (max file size size), with 'dlp-setting' feature enabled;  with DLP Fallback action feature flag enabled
custom_steps:
- Create Email outbound policy with multiple DLP Profiles
- Draft Email with attachment of total size > 64 MB with DLP Sensitive content
- review ASP connection in smtpmod and dispatch logs
- Email should at receiver
- Look for Policy hit and alert
custom_expected:
- Verify Application event is created and alert is not generated
- Look out DLP failure  due to file-size limit exceeded
"dlp_fail_reason": "DLP scan file-size limit exceeded",
"dlp_scan_failed": "yes"
- Email should have additional header  "x-netskope-fallback-action: true" 
- Verify no smtp proxy crash due to holding large emails
